msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

author.persName: Fath Allah b. Shukr Allah al-Sharif al-Kashani.

msItem.title: Manhaj al-sadiqin fi ilzam al-mukhalifin. Vol. V (of five).
Qur'anic Commentary. Covers suras xlvii-cxiv. (So Storey. Not checked.)
msItem.note: Not in Morley Printed Cat. By the same scribe as CODRINGTON/READE NO 1, which contains volume 1 of the same work. Colophon states that the whole work was copied at various times (awqat muta'addida) and in strange circumstances (halat ghariba wa awda' 'ajiba). F1 recto has pencil note giving description. Not by Shaikh Baha' al-Din, as stated in earlier catalogues. Some rubrication.
msItem.incipit: Surat Muhammad, In sura-ra sura-yi qattal niz guyand

handNote.desc: Nasta'liq with some shikasta forms. Title and author's name given in inscription by the copyist on f1a.
handNote.persName: Mu'in al-Din Muhammad b. Muhammad Salih Shirwani(?)

bindingDesc.p: Cloth and board binding by Whitelaw and Fensham, Tudor Street, E.C. Paper label on spine: Persian 2.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
